text: Hailemariam Desalegn Boshe () (born 19 July 1965) is an Ethiopian politician. He became Prime Minister of Ethiopia in July 2012 after the death of then- Prime Minister Meles Zenawi. He resigned on 15 February 2018 after mass protests and civil unrest. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Ethiopia Category:African Union chairpersons
title: Hailemariam Desalegn
